name: isene/HyperList
description: A powerful Terminal User Interface (TUI) application for creating, editing, and managing HyperLists - a methodology for describing anything in a hierarchical, structured format.

name: wilburhimself/gem_guard
description: GemGuard is your one-stop solution for Ruby supply chain security. Detect vulnerabilities, identify typosquats, generate SBOMs, and secure your dependencies with enterprise-grade tooling designed for modern DevOps workflows.
